contentrichtext.text: {{For|the Dutch painter|Kees van Dongen}} {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Dongen | image_skyline = Dongen P1040613.JPG | image_flag = Dongen_Netherlands.svg | flag_size = 120x100px | flag_alt = Flag of Dongen | image_seal = | seal_size = | seal_alt = | image_shield = Coat of arms of Dongen.svg | shield_size = 120x100px | shield_alt = Coat of arms of Dongen |image_map = LocatieDongen.png |mapsize = 250px |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_region = NL |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = [[North Brabant]] |area_footnotes = (2006) |area_total_km2 = 29.72 |area_land_km2 = 29.34 |area_water_km2 = 0.38 |population_as_of = 1 January, 2007 |population_note = Source: [[Statistics Netherlands|CBS]], [http://statline.cbs.nl/ Statline]. |settlement_type = Municipality |population_total = 25487 |population_density_km2 = 869 |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 |latd=51|latm=37|lats=|latNS=N |longd=04|longm=58|longs=|longEW=E }} '''Dongen''' ({{pronunciation|186 Dongen.ogg}}) is a [[municipality]] and a village in the southern [[Netherlands]]. In the past it was home to a profitable Leather industry, to which a few old shoe factories in the town's older sections still testify. The town is formed near a small river called "Donge" (about ten feet across), the water of which was used extensively for the leather industry. The [[Aerts]] Automobile was built here in 1899. == Population centres == *'''Dongen''' (population: 22,270) *[['s Gravenmoer]] (2,220) *[[Vaart]] (500) *[[Klein-Dongen]] (220) == Famous Personalities == *Wardt van der harst (Re-Ward) *[[Rolf Snoeren]] (1969) Fashion designer. *[[Karel Willemen]] (1967) Designer *Tjerkovara (Tjerk de Haas) (1986) Rapper *[[Kelly van Zon]] (1987) table tennis player ==External links== *{{Commons category-inline}} *[http://www.dongen.nl Official Website] {{Geographic location | Centre = Dongen | North = [[Waalwijk]] | East = [[Loon op Zand]] | Southeast = [[Tilburg]] | South = [[Gilze en Rijen]] | West = [[Oosterhout]] | Northwest = [[Geertruidenberg]] }} {{North Brabant Province}} [[Category:Municipalities of North Brabant]] [[Category:Populated places in North Brabant]] {{NorthBrabant-geo-stub}}
